lead_paragraph: Shortly after the collapse of East Germany in the Leipzig suburb, Rico, Daniel, Paul and Mark are growing up in the maelstrom of the newly reunited country. The boys run wild and hang out in the neighborhood, steal cars, experiment with drugs and try out the new swingers' club. They open their own disco which is soon besieged by neo-Nazi skinheads. Everything is in a state of flux and  decay, and everyone is overflowing with dreams.
